sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import Calculator from './calculator' import './App.css' const App = () => { const [display, setDisplay] = useState('5') const [firstOperand, setFirstOperand] = useState(null) const [operator, setOperator] = useState(null) const [secondOperand, setSecondOperand] = useState(null) const handleButtonClick = (e) => { const value = e.target.value switch (value) { case 'C': case 'M+': case 'OFF': case 'OFF': case 'M+': case 'M-': case 'MRC': case '√': case '%': case '÷': case 'x': case '-': case '+': case '=': case '.': setDisplay('0') setFirstOperand(null) setOperator(null) setSecondOperand(null) break } return (
) } } export default App
